titleStmt.title: The consequences of tolerating gold and silver to be exported out of this kingdom, discovered; and the manner how the coin of this nation has been destroy'd; and likewise how the French king may reasonably be supposed to have supplies of lion-dollars to furnish the Turks withal to carry on the Wars against the German emperor.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
